actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs, H. Rept. 96-1283.
Measure called up by consent calendar in House.

actions.committee: Senate Select Committee on Indian Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Select Committee on Indian Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section 2 of the Indian Claims Commission Act of August 13, 1946 (60 Stat. 1049; 25U.S.C. 70a), as amended.

summary.text: Amends the Indian Claims Commission Act of 1946 to prohibit the Indian Claims Commission, in determining the amount of payment to be made by the United States to an Indian claimant, from setting off against such payment any money or property given to, or funds expended gratuitously for, such claimant after June 30, 1951.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 2 of the Indian Claims Commission Act of August 13, 1946 (60 Stat. 1049; 25U.S.C. 70a), as amended.
